comments.body: Seems a little weird to have this extra line, and it's supposedly because intersections always have an extra `this`-type? Seems like a leak of impl. details
Should open another issue for this; this was the prior message.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@!!! error TS2345:       Type 'Foo' is not assignable to type 'S["a"] & T'.
!!! error TS2345:         Type 'Foo' is not assignable to type 'S["a"]'.
!!! error TS2345:           Type 'T' is not assignable to type 'S["a"]'.
!!! error TS2345:             Type 'Foo' is not assignable to type 'S["a"]'.
        }
